item.title: Install QEMU/KVM Server on Debian 10 Headless Server
item.description:
Kernel based Virtual Machine (KVM) is a widely used free and open source type 2 hypervisor for Linux distributions.

This post described a workthrough on how to install and configure QEMU/KVM on a Debian 10/buster server.

item.title: Batch Calculate and Verify MD5 Checksum With GNU Parallel
item.description: Calculating or verifying md5 checksums for lots of file always a time-consuming process. Here are some notes for how to work with md5 checksum via GNU parallel.
